item.title: By: Tony
item.dc:creator: Tony
item.description:
I was going to complain that the image was wrong but I guess the data source http://www.w3schools.com/browsers/browsers_stats.asp was incorrect. ;-) There was no netscape 5, it was scrapped and netscape 6 was launched instead. http://sillydog.org/netscape/verinfo.php
neat graphic though. :-)
item.content:encoded:
